title: BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC posts September sales down 57.5 pct y/y
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's HTC posts September sales down 57.5 pct y/y 
Oct 5 HTC Corp 
* Says September sales at T$7.1 billion ($217.86 million), down 57.5 percent y/y 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1JO6oNU 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.5900 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom) Trending On Reuters
